content: Finally! After waiting sense it's release on mobiles i waited for an update too fix it's stability. Now i can play it and I'm enjoying this game so much. Thanks for making it work better, love this game so far üòÅ
I can't download it anymore I keep deleting it and reinstalling it but it still doesn't work.
Why do I have to pay for a new version of a game when i already bought it? Very bad practice.

This is by far one of PixelFade's best games. It plays with zero issues on my device, the story is great, there are like 9 different possible endings, and it is worth the money. I cannot explain how much I enjoyed Crystalline and how absolutely amazing it is. If you're looking for a great Visual Novel, this is it.

Best visual novel on Android, period. I really hope you guys make a sequel or another adventure-type visual novel like this, maybe with some puzzles or more advanced mini-games? The story kept me captivated throughout and the script & voice acting was spectacular , but I just feel like if you are going to include a mini-game you may as well make it a tad bit more difficult. Having to solve a puzzle at each temple would have been a fun addition. But I still loved every minute of this!
Sony Xperia 1. Just play this masterpiece. Very well worth it.
Never watched anime but love this and ace

18:9 PLEASE!!! Ace Academy was a blast few years ago. I didn't even look at the reviews before buying this today. Hearing AmaLee at the start was nice but this needs to be patched with 18:9 support otherwise it ruins the immersion. Not bad enough to request a refund but really wish 18:9 and text size support is added. Even basic renpy VNs have those options!
Banana
Still Waiting for more stories..
It was a very fun experience. Liked the storytelling, music, characters and art. Worth a try!

The game Is Really good, just like isekai anime with only one main heroine, Too bad he lost all of his abilities after the battle. Hoping to see new release if possible either a sequel or new storyline. There are multiple ending but i haven't tried'em all. Eitherway, Keep up The good work
Love the story and characters. Can't wait for your next game.
Very good im mean real good. Keep it up the good work.
Any news of new games PixelFade ? I kinda shocked to see only 3 so far on Google Play Store .
Great story
Excelente
As expected of PixelFade, superb storytelling.
What the heck is this doesn't open up ...... I just wasted my money on it worst game

A Great Visual Novel on Android indeed! Cool Plot, Nice Graphics and all but, there is a problem when loading save files. u guys really need to fix that one hehehe...(reached true ending at first try‚úåÔ∏èüòÅ Oops... might have spoiled something there. Sorry.) GREAT GAME FOR PIXELFADE!, HOPE THE DEVELOPERS MAKE A NEW ONE!

My first ever VN, and IMHO it's an ideal "starter" VN for anyone looking into the genre for the first time. Typical isekai anime story tackling romance, friendship and adventure, with gorgeous art and polished voice-acting to boot. I have no other VNs to compare it with, but if most VNs were at this level of quality then I have a lot of great content to consume.
This vn is a masterpiece
its a good game like ace academy i wish there was a Continuation
The game is stuck on loading screen right at the beginning. Will update review once this issue is resolved.
Very enjoyable, I love the voice acting and the smooth animations. The only problem that I have is the loading times are a bit long.
No ads or in app purchases
Such a great story, I really enjoyed it!
High quality VN experience. Hard to not reccomend this one.

The game has really great and smooth moving graphics, good controls, funny dialogue, pretty good characters, and very fun to play. There's only 2 problems: Quicksaving and Quickloading don't work after a few minutes unless I close the app then open it again and Loading a save sometimes freezes the game. Other than that the game plays smoothly.
My Introduction to visual novels and what a wonderful story! I loved it so much it made me purchase all the Pixelfade stories. Funny and well thought out!

ive completed the story once but now its stuck on the loading screen and wont load the game at all other than this issue great game looking foward to playing through it more if i can get this issue fixed
replyContent:
There was a load issue on a few specific devices that has been fixed in V7. If you are still experiencing difficulties, please email us at team@pixelfade.com and we can take a look at your issue or alternatively, provide a refund.

Best Regards,

content: Wonderful game a must buy great story
One of the best VN i played. Thank you for this amazing game pixelfade
Crystalline is a really fun story and one of the best Western visual novels. For people worried about crashes, I have not had the game crash on me once from beginning to end.
Just finished the game with the true ending a few minutes ago. This has got to be the best vn game I ever played!!!!!
BEST ROMANCE GAME ‚ô•Ô∏è
10/10 üëå although there is a problem in saving/loading game but still if one of the best visual novels. I hope more to come from PiXelFaDe
Everything is good except the ending I thought the hero can choose to stay and live with heroine.

Incredible story line and good quality Graphics and art work is exquisite and fantastic Choices and is also such a brilliant play of game play I can't wait to see what you guys come up with next ,looking forward to anther game of yours. Can't wait to buy form playstore keep it up.
Many bugs
Very cute characters and storyline is very immersive. Wish there are other romance options but nonetheless a great experience. I'm really looking forward to more things to come from this creator.

It was really amazing seeing PixelFade come so far and better after Ace Academy... The only reason I'm not giving this a 5-star is because the choices to get the true ending are really difficult... Otherwise all in all, one of the best VN I've ever played!!!!
Your visual novel is the best. I looking forward to your next visual novel. Please do your best
Beautiful story. Even more beautiful graphics.

Excellent writing, art and animation, exceeding the standards PixelFade set for themselves in ACE Academy. However, there are sometimes spelling errors and missing or mismatched voice lines. Additionally, the load game function regularly freezes my game when used outside the main menu, forcing me to quit the game and restart the application. Nevertheless, despite indications of a lack of polish, Crystalline is definitely fun and enjoyable and certainly well worth the money.

This game. The narrating is great. The voice acting is great. The story is great.The music is fitting. The arts are all amazing. A Great visual novel. Is a perfect time burner If you have 4-8 hours of free time.
Guys at Pixel Fade, if I knew you had these games on mobile I would have gotten here instead of on steam üôÉ Anyhow, I have been really enjoying all of your games, keep up the great work. üëç

I love Emilia. wait wrong anime, but it's lame that you can't date the best girl in the game. Being able to reject the other one and make her cry is totally worth it though. Also, even on a Snapdragon 821 the game lagged often when doing animations. Edit: They improved the performance, but figuring out the routes is still really hard.
Amazing game. Easily one of the best mobile visual novels to own.
Good story, but after the recent updates, I get stuck at the white loading screen and cant play anymore.
A masterpiece

Great VN

Well worth playing. Some sections of the storyline seemed a bit rushed in their resolution, and the memes were a bit much at times, but the presentation and style is strong and the overall story and setting is nice. Well done.
I very love it...maybe have some bugs but it okey for me...I hope you do another sequel...üòäüòäüòä

im still updating this game to see if the issues are fixed..but very good story....perhaps you could add more romantic stuff into your next game but anyway very good vn

Is one star because I can't play it, Not because of the game itself.  UPDATE: Sigh, It looks like both my devices are 32bit, My bad,Can I possibly get a refund? content: This game doesn't play or load on the Galaxy Tab S4. I start the game, then it hangs on a blank load screen before playing any cinematics. Fortunately, it seems fine on another device. Thanks for the sale price.
Another great game from PixelFade! I got hooked with Ace Academy and I love Crystalline too. Great story and voice acting, always fun and funny. Keep it up!
Every time I open the application it stays on the loading screen. Was really looking forward to playing it though!

Amazing, that's the first word that comes to mind when I think about this game. The story was really great and the visuals were breathtaking. The gameplay mechanics also reminded of their previous work 'Kaori:After Story', which was also an amazing visual novel. I can't wait to see what Pixelfade has in store for us next.

such an amazing game. I will honestly pay even more just to replay it. I loved playing every bit of it and the I also enjoyed the emotional journey that it put me through. This game is easily a 5 star visual novel. Honestly I have loved every game by pixel fade and I am not adverse to even joining pixelfades kickstarter to just play more games like this. Other people should play this game and pay the reasonable price for it because it's just a masterpiece thanks pixel fade.

An amazing visual novel as every single one from Pixel Fade Crystallline has an incredible story with love adventure and funny moments if feels like you are the main character from an Isekai anime, it has a long playing time with a lot of choices who can change the game and different endings. I recommended this game with pleasure and I am also looking forward to Ethereal Enigma and if you could make an after story for this and Valerie and Yuuna from Ace academy it will be incredible.

The story is magical and fun experience. I have to say this is a longer story than ACE academy. Play this game and you won't regret it. Done with the game and I wish I forgot the story and I would gladly to enjoy the experience again. Read ALL of your visual novels. Looking forward to Ethereal Enigma when it releases and comes to mobile.

Hey PixelFade, the game isn't even loading now! I was recommended this game by an Etheral Enigma backer and so I bought it, but now the game is just a pink screen. The OP music kicks in with A Million Stars but just pink graphics.
please add wide screen (19.5:9) support!
Awesome and Amazing Visual Novel. I want Crystalline 2 (sequel).

I was intrigued with how Pixelfade were going to play this VN out as it's a different approach to ACE Acadmey with it not being based on school life. And I can say I was definitely impressed! They added alot more banter so you definitely won't get bored, most of the time it will get crying out in laughter with sometimes how ridiculous the characters are being √ó)) I'm not gonna lie I do prefer ACE Academy as I'm sucker for school life but this came very close (almost too close!) to ACE Academy!!!

It's a blast. Awesome on spot voice cast, great verbal quirky humor and nice animated scenes/graphics. Recommended. üëçüôÇ‚ú® Edited: Just finished the game, got to say the game's true ending has a nice niche to it. Do make a sequel.üéâüëèüíØüí•

I need more crystalline. i loved the storyline, i loved how well the voice acting was. Impressed by the animation. Few bugs here and there but nothing that really bothered me. Overrall an amazing visual novel. I do not regret paying for this and I am hoping there will be a sequel. From which I'll gladly buy as well.
One Word : Amazing You guys always managed to make a great visual novel.
Awesome story, writing, art,... I really liked this one!
Exciting and fun story
Keeps crashing on my phone :<

It's a good game. It's just as good as Ace Academy but the amount of black screens I get is not normal and I can't get past the Inn in Costa Coral because it just keeps crashing. I reloaded saves and have restarted the game but nothing is working. Such a shame I can't complete the game. Other than this one major problem it's a great game.
Best game I have ever played on my phone by far. If you like fantasy novels, it's worth every cent üëç!

Dear PixelFade, I am utterly dissatisfied by how many hours of good sleep is lost because of this ingenious creation of yours. How can you make something so diabolical that makes me want to stare in front of my phone for hours on end flicking page by page, scene by scene, giggle by giggle? How dare you twist my arm and exploit my weakness by using a heroine who is blonde, has big blue eyes, wears armor, AND is able to cast magic? No, I do not a want a refund, just make a sequel, please?!
wont let me start what to do
good game plz make after story

The story is amazing, better than many movies or books out there, it is totally worth, i can't wait for a second part, or at least some sort of spin off showing more of their life after the true end, congratulations to everyone that worked on this.
Amazing choose your choice game. Fantastic and fun, just as Ace Academy is.

Hi.. it me again i just bought this game tonight and i have one problem with it, do you guys mind adding an option to mute dialogue audio? I would appreciate it a lot! thank you for reading my comments ^^

Pixel Fade has done it again. This game is incredible! Maybe even better than Ace Academy. The story is and the characters are amazing. It has happy, cute, epic and sad moments. Worth every cent. It is pretty long too, it took me like 14 hours to complete it.

finally i can download the game, best vn i've played, the animation is smooth but a bit lag here n there but nothing major, the story is amazing but i don't like when zack n kara "sharing bed" being told, for me that's just weird, and to bad there's no kara route, i really like her, but if having her route affect the story then i don't mind not having it, overall i love crystalline way more than ace academy, i really hope there's an leanna after story, keep up the good work
I bought Ace Academy, Crystalline & Kaori Afterstory on Steam. I nvr hesitate to buy this on my android phone XD Thank you for this!

Ive played this game on steam and it was so good! One of the few visual novels that keeps me entertained. Ive also played Ace Academy and KAS, I also support you guys on Patreon. That being said I am currently rating this three stars because the game crashes after I play the first mini game. I cant seem to continue past that point. Once you guys get that fixed then I will change my rating to five stars!

content: Sadly the game doesn't have the same replayability value like ACE, and comparing it to ACE makes it look weak despite the 2D animations and art improvement. You are locked on a single romance option and can't choose who you want to be with despite having other characters. And you get to witness an awkwardly progressing romance between other two characters. The story is good overall, a few unmatching lines, a lot of funny moments and emotional scenes from start to end; it's a good experience.

I love it!I freakin love it!You should definitely make more visual novels like this on playstore!Oh,and please get AmaLee as one of the CVs again.I basically associate PixelFade with AmaLee since she becomes CV for Mei in ACE Academy!

so far this game has surprised me. I play alot of games on the playstore but this one has quickly become one of my favorites. The art style, the voice acting hell even the character designs are top notch. after playing "ace academy" i was a little sad but seeing 2 new stories from you devs makes me happy. keep up the hard work everyone. oh one last thing nice touch having Amalee as the voice for leanah :)
still really amazing cannot wait for the next game you guys make really looking forward to it.

(Spoiler Warning) Really disappointed there's only one romance option, I bought this right after finishing Ace Academy in hopes of a similar experience but instead i got shoehorned into a single relationship where its first girl wins. This could have been so much more.
One of the best. The feels come strong. So happy this exists.

Best visual novel ever! Would highly recommend this to everyone. Its so good I had to buy it twice to support the best developers ever. Thank you Pixel Fade for making such a amazing game loved everything about it ‚ù§Ô∏è.
